ItemType.name: [crate(s) of ]bok choy
ItemType.description: Bok choy is sold alongside most low grade foodstuffs so that its antioxidant properties can help negate the carcinogens present in most vat-grown foods.

ItemType.name: [crate(s) of ]napa cabbages
ItemType.description: This type of cabbage is usually fermented to make a variety of dishes and is said to go well with Centauri rice.

ItemType.name: [crate(s) of ]green cabbages
ItemType.description: A guilty pleasure of high-level Corporate officers, green cabbage has unique subtle flavors and is grown on nearly every Cabbage Corp station.

ItemType.name: [barrel(s) of ]kohlrabi
ItemType.description: Kohlrabi is mostly used as a deluxe animal feed due to the taste that connoisseurs believe it imparts on the meat.

ItemType.name: [crate(s) of ]savoy cabbages
ItemType.description: Savoy cabbage is the most tender and sweet variety of cabbage and is currently considered trendy in the elite crowd.

ItemType.name: [barrel(s) of ]pickled red cabbages
ItemType.description: Red cabbage is only produced on Earth and is usually pickled for transport throughout human space. It is often used in gourmet dishes such as sauerkraut.

ItemType.name: [crate(s) of ] kale
ItemType.description: Kale provides important nutrients to supplement those missing from standard rations. It is also one of the leading homoeopathic remedies to all known ills.

ItemType.name: [chest(s) of ]brussel sprouts
ItemType.description: This delicacy, produced only in the temperate climate of the Seward Peninsula on Earth, is carefully cryopreserved to enhance its taste as much as possible and to enable transport beyond the Sol system.

ItemType.name: solar panel
ItemType.description: Solar panel converts sunlight into energy usable by a ship's reactor. At least six are required to form a working array.

ItemType.name: [container(s) of ]proto-cabbagium catalyst
ItemType.attributes: cabbageCorp, consumable, fuel, protoCabbagium, res, zeroPoint
ItemType.description: This exotic substance is used in trace amounts to catalyse the radioactive growth of various elements via the absorption of high energy solar particles. Transuranic elements grown in this manner can be incredibly strong, according to the included instruction manual.

ItemType.name: your personal belongings
ItemType.description: You've been sent on a mission from Domina, might as well sell all of your family's stuff for cash. They'll learn to live without.

ItemType.name: pygmy ostrich horse
ItemType.description: These pets are the result of early 23rd century research into creating a hulk by inseminating ostrich foetuses with horse semen while exposing them to gamma radiation. Cabbage Corp created the pygmy version shortly after obtaining the patents when the original researchers declared bankruptcy.
